title: Are they still giving out mystery champs?
body:
I never got anything for linking to Facebook.... 

Still a new player so I only own about 5 champs and was really hoping for a new one.
I'm on the North American server, thanks for any info!

replies.body: Yup! We're still in the process. If you have less than 10 champions left un-purchased and therefore are ineligible for a Mystery Champion, then you will be awarded a Mystery Skin instead

I got Teemo. I believe this is a bug, as that much evil should not exist.

#Kill Teemo {{champion:17}}
Teemo isn't evil, just misunderstood. ;)
riot once the mystery skin/champion is recieved how do u claim it i recieved the notification but do not know how to claim said mystery champion
The notification signifies that the content has been unlocked, and should be available. You won't need to do anything additional.
i do not notice what champion was unlocked..it never told me what was unlocked....and i don't see a new champion unlocked..is there a way to check and see what was unlocked?

You can check your Gifting History under Purchases.

Store -> Purchases -> View My Gifting History
i checked what you said..however nothing is listed in gifting history plz note that i have never recieved a gift inside of league of legends
It appears that it's not showing up the way it did previously when gifts were received. You may need to contact Player Support to find out what you received. D: Sorry about that!

okay cool thank you!
save me someone good =)
FYI, it may take up to 2 weeks before everyone gets their free mystery champion/skin
Oh for real, where did you get this information from?
STILL HAVEN'T GOT ANYTHING!!!
I still haven't received my mystery champ I've been told to be patient, but this is starting to get ridiculous.

I see you said two days ago that you guys are still handing them out. But are you done or still have more? My friend and I are just confused why our champs have not come. I told him it would take sometime, but if the gifting for linking to Facebook has stopped, I and AgentNorthDakota have not received our champs. //We are on the NA server. Thank you for taking your time to read and answer. {{item:3070}}

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/3VhOeAbf-pool-party-rewards-distribution-on-going

Check out this post. As of right now, they are still distributing the mystery champions/skins, and the post says that it may take up to 2 weeks for them to be fully distributed. It will be updated when the distribution is complete.
When did you link to facebook?

I linked on the last day before it ended, it said have it linked by like 11:59 pm, and I linked my FB before that at like 6 pm.
On the 29th the website said to do it.
http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/special-event/last-day-how-unlock-your-mystery-champion

=/
They still are, if you linked before the event was over.

I heard that theyre still distributing them...but im not sure...

I have yet to get anything for linking to facebook...however my account had been banned for 2 weeks so idk if my account is eligible for the reward ( though i think it is because I linked to facebook and that was all you had to do..it wasn't a community gift or anything so idk why my ban would matter) 

If you don't/haven't had a ban and you linked your account to facebook BEFORE the 28 of June, then you WILL receive a gift and if you don't you can send a player support ticket to riot. since you're new I'll go ahead and explain how to do that since you'll probably need to use the feature eventually in your league career and I never learned about it until a couple months ago (Ive been playing for 2 years)

Basically, there is a button in the top right corner of this screen that says support. Click it and it takes you to another page, make an account on this page (A riot support account) using the same credentials that you used for your league account. Complete the e-mail verification and yada yada yada and then you can hit 'send a request' in the top right hand corner of the new page (after you've logged into your support account).

You can use this riot support request to refute any unjust bans or restrictions that you may recieve (just make sure that you really didn't deserve the ban AT ALL otherwise riot will jsut be like 'you were still toxic even though you were not the worse one on your team etc. and you are still going to serve out your ban...etc..) its also helpful if you disconnect from a game and get a leave buster ban...If it was an accident bec your internet cut out during a ranked game or anything, you can send that info to riot and have them fix what happened.

You should get your reward though. riot takes awhile sometimes.
actually the initial support button is the last button from the left to right...its more in the middle top of the page. lol.
